forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 55. West southwest wind 13 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 13 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As night falls in Downtown San Francisco, a gentle haze of clouds wraps the city in a soft embrace, hinting at a slight chance of drizzle that may kiss the streets after 11 PM. The air feels brisk, a cool whisper of the west-southwest wind that rustles through the tall buildings like a restless spirit. With temperatures wavering around 55, a light jacket or a warm sweater would be a comfort against the cooling night. 

Tomorrow, the sun will rise with a promise, pushing the clouds aside for a mostly sunny day; yet, as is often the case in this coastal paradise, whispers of morning drizzle could accompany breakfast, before a vibrant high of around 64 emerges in the afternoon. As the day unfolds, layers of clothing will serve well—perhaps a light, breathable top under a cozy outer layer as the winds remain vigorous at 13 to 24 mph. The city, with its eclectic neighborhoods and winding streets, beckons for a leisurely stroll or a meandering visit to a cozy café, where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee melds with the crispness of the air. Today’s unique blend of clarity and marine haze invites exploration rather than retreat, a reminder of the simple pleasures nestled within the urban landscape.
